equals(Object) - Method in class com.fermod.observer.ObservedValue
 
EventPublisher<T> - Class in com.fermod.event
Class that allows to register and notify event listeners.

G

get() - Method in class com.fermod.observer.ObservedValue
Returns the value that is being observed.

H

hashCode() - Method in class com.fermod.observer.ObservedValue
 

N

notifyListeners(Consumer<? super T>) - Method in class com.fermod.event.EventPublisher
Notifies and executes on each of the registered listeners the provided function.

O

ObservedValue<T> - Class in com.fermod.observer
Class that wraps a value and gives the utility of registering listeners that will be called after any variable value change.
ObservedValue() - Constructor for class com.fermod.observer.ObservedValue
Default constructor of the class ObservedValue<T>.
ObservedValue(T) - Constructor for class com.fermod.observer.ObservedValue
Constructor of the class ObservedValue<T> that takes as parameter the value that will be initialized the observed value.
onValueChanged(T, T) - Method in interface com.fermod.event.ValueChangeListener
Function called when the listened to variable value change.

R

registerListener(T) - Method in class com.fermod.event.EventPublisher
Adds the specified listener to the list of registered listeners.

S

set(T) - Method in class com.fermod.observer.ObservedValue
Changes the value with the new given one, and notifies all the registered listeners of the change.
set(T, boolean) - Method in class com.fermod.observer.ObservedValue
Changes the value with the new given one, and depending if the notification on change is enabled or not it will notify all the registered listeners.

U

unregisterAllListeners() - Method in class com.fermod.event.EventPublisher
Removes all the listeners from the list of the registered listeners.
unregisterListener(T) - Method in class com.fermod.event.EventPublisher
Removes the first occurrence of the specified listener from the list of the registered listeners.

V

ValueChangeListener<T> - Interface in com.fermod.event
The listener interface for receiving value change events.
